title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
ier during the goblin attack, then he starts introducing himself. Your next set of choices will look like this:

I'm Player's Name What is this place? I take my thanks in coin.

Choosing the first option will make him warn you that visitors are no longer welcome in Emerald Grove. He then says whatever your business is with this place, he wants to see to it quickly, since the druids are forcing everyone out and this attack will only strengthen their resolve.
